sourcing.instructions: - Gadolinium Oxide: Chemical suppliers (e.g. Sigma-Aldrich, Alfa Aesar)
steps: - Gadolinium Oxide: Chemical suppliers (e.g. Sigma-Aldrich, Alfa Aesar)
1. Measure 10.93 g of Gadolinium Oxide using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 10.93 g of Gadolinium Oxide using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture to a ceramic crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a ceramic crucible.

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool inside the furnace.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool inside the furnace.

steps: 1. Carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
